newsitem.title: USA: BET Holdings buys 6,600 shares of its stock.
newsitem.headline: BET Holdings buys 6,600 shares of its stock.

text.p: BET Holdings Inc, parent company of Black Entertainment Television, said Monday it had purchased 6,600 shares of its common stock on the open market.
The purchases were made at prices ranging from $24.375 to $25.75 per share from July 16 through August 21, the company said.
BET Holdings may continue purchasing shares of common stock at prevailing market prices, although purchases may be discontinued at anytime, the company said.
The repurchased shares will become treasury shares and will be used for general corporate purposes, including stock options and employee incentive plans.
